doc: Pokémon X/Y ‒ Absent of lighting on model in software renderer
*Hardware renderer*/*Software renderer* on left & right screenshot respectively.
Notice there is one inconsistent diagonal line spacing (could be missing a diagonal line) on the bottom of the 3DS screen using the software renderer mode.

`Render.OpenGL <Error> video_core\renderer_opengl\renderer_opengl.cpp:DebugHandler:483: API ERROR 1282: GL_INVALID_OPERATION error generated. Texture name does not refer to a texture object generated by OpenGL.`
